channel.title: data processing on Roman Grebennikov
channel.description: Recent content in data processing on dfdx.me

item.title: Extending flink state serialization
item.description: Operations with Flink state are a common source of performance issues for a typical stateful stream processing application. One tiny mistake can easily make your job to spend most of a precious CPU time in serialization and inflate a checkpoint size to the sky. In this talk we’ll focus on a Flink serialization framework and common problems happening around it
